data.title: Boy Like You Lyrics by Casey Desmond
data.meta_description: Boy Like You Lyrics, Casey Desmond, I put my hands between your thighsAnd I get lost
data.text:
Clean Lyric

Paragraph Lyric

I put my hands between your thighs

And I get lost by hearing your sweet sighs

Please forgive me, I'm not the type with the mouth to close

But who knows

I put my lips on the hips that keep me swaying and

If you hold tight I'll give you a bite of what I'm saying

No more secrets I know you can't keep them

Let's say we give it a try tonight

'Cause I know what to do, I know what to do with a boy like you,

And I'll get it right sooner or later cause I know you want me to,

And I'll make you feel so nice

'Cause it's just a game, I ain't the same as all the other Janes

I'm sweating hard with a deep and bold obsession

And you've been intimidated by this girl's aggression

Let's keep sorrys behind us for now

I am behaving

Like my conscience told me not to

And I know what to do, I know what to do with a boy like you,

And I'll get it right sooner or later cause I know you want me To,

And I'll make you feel so right

'Cause it's just a game, I aint the same as all the other Janes

I'll know what to do, I know what to do with a boy like you

And I'll, I know what to do with a boy like you

With a boy like you, oh

'Cause it's just a game, I ain't the same, I ain't as plain as all The other Janes

It's just a game, I ain't the same as all the other Janes

I put my hands between your thighs And I get lost by hearing your sweet sighs Please forgive me, I'm not the type with the mouth to close But who knows I put my lips on the hips that keep me swaying and If you hold tight I'll give you a bite of what I'm saying No more secrets I know you can't keep them Let's say we give it a try tonight 'Cause I know what to do, I know what to do with a boy like you, And I'll get it right sooner or later cause I know you want me to, And I'll make you feel so nice 'Cause it's just a game, I ain't the same as all the other Janes I'm sweating hard with a deep and bold obsession And you've been intimidated by this girl's aggression Let's keep sorrys behind us for now I am behaving Like my conscience told me not to And I know what to do, I know what to do with a boy like you, And I'll get it right sooner or later cause I know you want me To, And I'll make you feel so right 'Cause it's just a game, I aint the same as all the other Janes I'll know what to do, I know what to do with a boy like you And I'll, I know what to do with a boy like you With a boy like you, oh 'Cause it's just a game, I ain't the same, I ain't as plain as all The other Janes It's just a game, I ain't the same as all the other Janes
